scripts.deps:all: npx depcruise src --include-only "^src" -x "useDependency|DependencyProvider|providers" --output-type dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > tools/index.html
scripts.deps:server: npx depcruise src --include-only "^src/server" -x "useDependency|DependencyProvider|providers" --output-type dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > tools/server-dependency-graph.html
scripts.deps:client: npx depcruise src --include-only "^src/client" -x "useDependency|DependencyProvider|providers" --output-type dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > tools/client-dependency-graph.html
